fact_check.social_media_perspective: Reddit (20 posts in r/BestofRedditorUpdates, complaints, DeepThoughts): LIKELY_TRUE
fact_check.time_verification: The provided web search results, dated between November 6, 2025, and November 21, 2025, confirm the reality of climate change. These are current as of November 29, 2025.
fact_check.explanation:
The World Meteorological Organization (WMO) explicitly defines and reports on climate change. The "State of the Global Climate" reports for 2023 and 2024, along with the WMO's Global Annual to Decadal Climate Update (2025-2029), all point to ongoing changes in the global climate. The WMO is a credible source, and multiple reports from them confirm the claim. Reddit discussions also indicate a consensus that climate change is real.\n\nüê¶ Social Media Perspective: Reddit (20 posts in r/BestofRedditorUpdates, complaints, DeepThoughts): LIKELY_TRUE

‚úì High confidence based on multiple authoritative sources.
key_evidence: The WMO defines climate change as changes in the state of the climate (November 6, 2025).
The State of the Global Climate 2023 report shows records were broken for greenhouse gas concentrations (Date not specified in search result, but likely published in 2024).
The WMO Global Annual to Decadal Climate Update (2025‚Äì2029) projects that global temperatures are expected to continue at or near record levels.

tips: Always verify information from multiple credible sources
Check the date and context of claims
Be skeptical of sensational or emotionally charged content
